
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in Yandex and called "ya"
# (https://github.com/yandex/yatool).
#
# Configuration files of ya build system are usually named ya.make. If ya.make file is present
# at the root of the repository, then this repository supports ya build. 
# 
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build 
# system may be rejected.

add_executable(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut)


target_link_libraries(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics
)

target_link_options(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
)

target_sources(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/dataset_statistics/ut/histograms_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/dataset_statistics/ut/statistics_serialization_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)


target_allocator(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut
  system_allocator
)

vcs_info(catboost-libs-dataset_statistics-ut)
